cmd.msg: Oops.. An error occurred while executing this command: ${error}

name.msg: The name ${name} is not valid, try a bigger name

chunk.msg: The chunk that you are standing is not loaded properly
The chunk that you are is already claimed to ${city}
The chunk that you are is reserved to ${city}

create.msg: The city ${name} was created successfully, if you get lost you can teleport back with /city spawn ${identity}

claim.msg: This chunk is already claimed in name of ${city}
Both cities ${1} and ${2} are touching this chunk, repeat the command specifying the city name.
There're no cities touching this chunk, get closer to your city and try again. If you want to create an island then specify the city name, if you want to create a new city then type ${create}
There's not city named $[name}, if you want to create a new city then type ${create}
You are not allowed to claim chunks in name of ${city}
This chunk was claimed to ${city} successfully.

disclaim.msg: This chunk is not claimed by any city
You are not allowed to disclaim a chunk owned by ${city}
Cannot disclaim the last city's chunk, delete the city instead
This chunk was disclaimed from ${city} successfully.

success.msg: This chunk was disclaimed from ${city} successfully. One island was created as result of this disclaim.
This chunk was disclaimed from ${city} successfully. ${count} islands were created as result of this disclaim.

rename.msg: You need to type the new name
The name ${name} is invalid, try a bigger name
You are not inside a city
You don't have permission to rename the city ${name}

player.msg: This will transfer this city to an other player, type the player name that will be the new owner
This will transfer this city to an other player, type the player name that will be the new owner, player names does not have spaces...

transfer.msg: You are not inside a city
The city ${name} is already owned by ${owner}
Only the server admins con transfer the city ${name}
The city ${name} is now owned by ${owner}

setspawn.msg: You are not inside a city
You are not allowed to change the ${name}'s spawn
The spawn is already set to that position

deny.msg: You are not inside a city
You are not allowed to change the ${city}'s permissions
You've typed a city name, type a player name instead to allow a specific player or type a group name after the city name to prohibit that specific group. Do not use spaces in the names.
No player was found with name ${name}
The city ${city} does not have a group named ${group}
No city was found with name ${name}
The permission was granted to the group ${group} from ${home} successfully
The permission was denied by default successfully

allow.msg: You are not inside a city
You are not allowed to change the ${city}'s permissions
You've typed a city name, type a player name instead to allow a specific player or type a group name after the city name to allow that specific group. Do not use spaces in the names.
No player was found with name ${name}
You've typed too many arguments, you can't give reason messages when allowing somebody.
The city ${city} does not have a group named ${group}
No city was found with name ${name}
The permission was granted by default successfully
The permission was granted to ${player} successfully
The permission was granted to the group ${group} from ${home} successfully
This command does not expect extra arguments, are you sure that you want to allow everybody?

create.msg: You need to type a name
The name ${name} is invalid, try a bigger name
You are not inside a city
You don't have permission to create groups in name of ${city}

add.msg: You are not inside a city
You don't have permission to add players to groups from ${city}
The group ${group} was not found in ${city}
No player was found with name ${name}
The player ${name} is already part of the group ${group}
The player ${player} is now part of the group ${group}

remove.msg: You are not inside a city
You don't have permission to remove players from groups from ${city}
The group ${group} was not found in ${city}
No player was found with name ${name}
The player ${name} is not a member of the group ${group}
The player ${player} is no longer part of the group ${group}

list.msg: You are not inside a city

action.msg: You don't have permission to perform this action.
You can't perform this action yet, your permission groups are still loading.

teleport.msg: The destiny world ${name} was not found or is not loaded

minecity-messages.msg: Oops, an error occurred while loading your groups: ${error}
